Update an existing workload configuration

  parameters={[{"description":"Workload name","in":"path","name":"name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}

audience","type":"string"},"client_id":{"description":"OAuth2 client ID","type":"string"},"client_secret":{"description":"OAuth2 client permissions","properties":{"inbound":{"description":"Inbound defines inbound network permissions","properties":{"allow_host":{"description":"AllowHost is a list of allowed hosts for inbound the container (e.g., \"host\", \"bridge\", \"none\")\nWhen empty, the default container runtime network mode is used","type":"string"},"outbound":{"description":"Outbound defines outbound network permissions","properties":{"allow_host":{"description":"AllowHost is a list of allowed hosts","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"allow_port":{"description":"AllowPort is a list of allowed ports","items":{"type":"integer"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"insecure_allow_all":{"description":"InsecureAllowAll allows all outbound network connections","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object","title":"permissions.OutboundNetworkPermissions"}},"type":"object","title":"permissions.NetworkPermissions"},"privileged":{"description":"Privileged indicates whether the container should run in privileged mode\nWhen true, the container has access to all host devices and capabilities\nUse with extreme caution as this removes most security isolation","type":"boolean"},"read":{"description":"Read is a list of mount declarations that the container can read from\nThese can be in the following formats:\n- A single path: The same path will be mounted from host to container\n- host-path:container-path: Different paths for host and container\n- resource-uri:container-path: Mount a resource identified by URI to a container path","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"write":{"description":"Write is a list of mount declarations that the container can write to\nThese follow the same format as Read mounts but with write permissions","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false}},"type":"object","title":"permissions.Profile"},"proxy_mode":{"description":"Proxy mode to
